data.title: A New Era of Network Monitoring with Paessler PRTG with Greg Ross
data.meta_description: Greg Ross, Senior Systems Engineer at Paessler, gives an overview of their IT infrastructure monitoring solution. This includes an introduction to the company’s history and mission. He gives a quick introduction into their new beta for PRTG on-demand cloud service. This allows for PRTG to be used on a subscription bases in the cloud.
data.text:
This video is part of the appearance, “Paessler Presents at Tech Field Day Extra at Interop ITX 2017“. It was recorded as part of Tech Field Day Extra at Interop ITX 2017 at 13:00-14:00 on May 17, 2017.

Watch on YouTube

Watch on Vimeo

Greg Ross, Senior Systems Engineer at Paessler, gives an overview of their IT infrastructure monitoring solution. This includes an introduction to the company’s history and mission. He gives a quick introduction into their new beta for PRTG on-demand cloud service. This allows for PRTG to be used on a subscription bases in the cloud.
